mapper.delete: delete from tb_review where review_no = #{review_no} and user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.update: update tb_review set review_content=#{review_content} where review_no=#{review_no} and user_no=#{user_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_review (user_no, rating , review_content) values (#{user_no}, #{rating}, #{review_content})
mapper.select: select user_nicknm, rating, review_content, review_no, tb_review.user_no, review_no from tb_review, tb_user where tb_review.user_no = tb_user.user_no order by review_no DESC
